channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large domestic cooker and parts dumped, 8th August
item.description:
I watched the resident whose flat over looks this and presuke His son bring it out and dump it tonight, Friday 8 August. He said “his friend “ is coming to collect it then changed his story and accused me of being racist. All Very unpleasant

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Palatine Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog crying/whining all day + night, 8th August
item.description:
For the past few weeks there's been a poor dog crying and whining at all times of day + night (mostly at night) almost every day now for hours at a time. It's not clear which number this is at but it doesn't sound like it's being properly taken care of.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Leabank Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard was damaged and now removed, 8th August
item.description:
One of the bollards on the junction of crossway and Petts wood road has been damaged and now removed from the road and left on the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Poverest, London

item.title: Denmark Hill SE5 there is a tree fallen down in Ruskin, 8th August
item.description:
Denmark Hill SE5 there is a tree fallen down in Ruskin Park next to fence line with Denmark Hill sort of opposite 127 Denmark Hill. Tree on Lambeth side footpath (rather than Southwark which 127 is on) and have to duck under. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor / Parks Dept. for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4665158,-0.0902384,3a,75y,246.46h,77.63t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1srsZd45ObANvcfO-rN_TUEw!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D12.371796931894806%26panoid%3DrsZd45ObANvcfO-rN_TUEw%26yaw%3D246.45948096537614!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDgwNS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Denmark Hill, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Denmark Hill SE5 footpath green pla, 8th August
item.description:
Denmark Hill SE5 footpath green plastic road sweeper’s bin outside King’s College Hospital’s “Outpatient Pharmacy”. item.title: Rear of 91 Dartmouth Rd, 8th August
item.description:
Council built new aqua drain last year. Rubble left in bags ever since. Mostly near the side of the building at the rear. (If at the rear facing the back of the building then it’s the right side). Also a couple of bags similar rubble strewn on the garden.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dartmouth Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load (Estates)

item.title: Black jaguar seized by Enforcement agent, 8th August
item.description:
There is a black jaguar in Priors Mead placed since Months, occupying an available space for other cars, which has been already seized since months by the enforcement agency. It does one yellow sticker and another red and yellow. The individual that owns the car is attempting to put the engines by using another car to recharge the batteries. I wish to inform the respective department regarding this matter.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Priors Mead, Southbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nw6 5pt bin store, 8th August
item.description:
I already reported this a few days ago. Since then more fly tipping has occurred, including kitchen cabinets and a barbecue, and now a huge lump of excrement. It is disgusting. My neighbour has some cctv footage of the person emptying his car boot.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Malvern Mews, London
Report on FixMyStreet
